name: Truck Zone
ProjectBrief: This is a truck buy sell site is for both customers and seller. customer can pay for his booked truck. Admin has much authority here.
ProjectIdea: This Project is About Old Truck Sell
KeyFeature:
A seller can post truck to sell
A seller can promote his truck, promoted items will show in home page
A seller can delete any product from list
An user can find truck based on three category
An user can see details of sales post and book a product
An user can pay for booked vehicles
An user can report product to admin
An admin can see all seller and buyer(user) list
An admin can make other admin
An admin can delete any reported products
TechnologyUsed:
HTML
TailWind used as CSS Library
daisyui used as Tailwind CSS component library
ReactJS used as JavaScript Library
React Router DOM, Context API etc. used in react
Google firebase is used for user authentication and live site deploy
react-icons are used for different icons used in the site
Mongo DB is used as cloud db with full CRUD operation
JWT is used for authorization of users
STRIPE is used as payment get-way
env variables are used to protect secret code
vercel is used to deploy served side.

name: Travel Go
ProjectBrief: This site is build for a individual VISA service provider. He can showcase his services and manage them. His customers can post review on service.
KeyFeature:
Get Information about different services of travel agent
User can add new services based on requirement
Customers can post their review and see others review for different services
Customers can delete and edit review for his logged in account
customer can login by registration or by buy using google account
One can red related blogs
on all service page one can click on image to seed big image
TechnologyUsed:
HTML
TailWind used as CSS Library
daisyui used as Tailwind CSS component library
ReactJS used as JavaScript Library
React Router DOM, Context API etc. used in react
Google firebase is used for user authentication and live site deploy
react-icons are used for different icons used in the site
Mongo DB is used as cloud db with full CRUD operation
JWT is used for authorization of users

name: Corporate Learning
ProjectBrief: This site was build for a trainer, who is focused on corporate training. Customers can show course details and download pdf copy of course details.
KeyFeature:
Trainer can add and manage courses
A user can see details of course
A user can download pdf of course details
User can take premium access to course
TechnologyUsed:
HTML
TailWind used as CSS Library
daisyui used as Tailwind CSS component library
ReactJS used as JavaScript Library
React Router DOM, Context API etc. used in react
Google firebase is used for user authentication and live site deploy
react-icons are used for different icons used in the site
